CustomField.description: The name of the named credential that is used to connect to Data Cloud. This is used to connect to the Data Cloud API, NOT the Salesforce API. This is a separate named credential and required for any data cloud action.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the named credential that is used to connect to Data Cloud. This is used to connect to the Data Cloud API, NOT the Salesforce API. This is a separate named credential and required for any data cloud action.
CustomField.label: Named Credential Name
